title: 96/302/EC: Commission Decision of 17 April 1996 establishing a format in which information is to be provided pursuant to Article 8 (3) of Council Directive 91/689/EEC on hazardous waste (Text with EEA relevance)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 17 April 1996 establishing a format in which information is to be provided pursuant to Article 8 (3) of Council Directive 91/689/EEC on hazardous waste (Text with EEA relevance) (96/302/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The document annexed to this Decision shall be the format in which information is to be provided pursuant to Article 8 (3) of Directive 91/689/EEC on hazardous waste.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 17 April 1996.
For the Commission
Ritt BJERREGAARD
Member of the Commission
EUROPEAN COMMUNITY
